sub_section_analysis.heading_title: Example of an Artiﬁcial Neural Network
sub_section_analysis.refined_text: this article takes a data fitting view of artificial neural networks . the data may show oil drilling sites on a map, where category A denotes a successful outcome .

sub_section_analysis.heading_title: Deep Learning: An Introduction for Applied
sub_section_analysis.refined_text: deep learning is becoming a pervasive tool in a host of applications fields . a deep neural network can be trained in calculus, approximation theory and optimization .

a deep neural network is becoming a pervasive tool in a host of applications fields . the idea is based on applied and computational mathematics . we illustrate the concepts with a short MATLAB code .
USENIX Symposium on operating systems design and Implemen- tation (OSDI 16), 2016, pp. 265–283 .
listing 6.1 shows how a network of the form shown in Figure 3 may be used on the data in Figure 1 . this MATLAB code has been written for clarity and brevity, rather than efficiency or elegance .

this article provides a very brief introduction to the basic concepts that un- derlie deep learning from an applied mathematics perspective . the article may also be useful for instructors in mathematics who wish to enliven their classes with references to the application of deep learning techniques .

deep learning is becoming a pervasive tool in a host of applications fields . a deep neural network can be trained in calculus, approximation theory and optimization .
deep learning is becoming a pervasive tool in a host of applications fields . a deep neural network can be trained in calculus, approximation theory and optimization .

the phrase deep learning relates to a set of tools that have become extremely popular in a vast range of applications . the field has grown to the extent where sophisticated software packages are available in the public domain .

the MATLAB code in Listings 6.1 and 6.2 can be found at http://personal.strath.ac.uk/d.j.higham/algfiles.html as well as an exteneded version that produces Figures 7 and 8 . a system for large-scale machine learning uses lsqnonlin to produce Figure 4 .

free online book [26] provides a hands-on tutorial style description of deep learning techniques . the survey gives an intuitive and accessible overview of many of the key ideas behind deep learning, and highlights recent success stories .
